A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pluses and Minuses of the movie in my view:
Pluses:
-Unexpected twists.
-Original content. Not a remake of ESB
-Makes Episode IX a mystery
-The Force connection between Kylo Ren and Rey
-Daisy Ridley's face
-Great development of new characters like Poe and Finn
-BB-8
-Leia actually used The Force (I think)


Minuses
-Guardians of The Galaxy style humor and comic relief-absolutely off the point in SW context\, distracting from the plot. Does not enhance plot/character development like it did in TFA. 
-Certain scenes looked like Jimmy Kimmel sketches not actual Star Wars
-Luke Skywalker-absolute waste of the most the most iconic character in the franchise. We don't get to experience his wisdom/power or motivations. 
-Does Luke actually teach Rey anything? 
-The new girl (Finn's friend)\, very poor character-skip
-The casino sequence (all of it)
-The two ladies that help Leia lead the Resistance
-Ray is just a random person?
-The pacing. 
-The movie does not have a definitive climax. What's the most important moment of the movie? 
-Trying to play on cheap emotions by making cheap emotional speeches that are in fact clicheic and disposed of any emotional charge. 
-Snoke
